page.title: 05Hankham village-continued
page.content: There are several small modern businesses in present day Hankham including the Primary School, which is cebrated its centinary in 1979.There is Hankham Nursery,Hankham Motorworks (garage),Mr Sapsford's Motors, Wynwoods Nurseries(Stone Cross), and Saxon Nurseries,which has recently closed down. Hankham has no shops and the post office no longer exists.There are no bus services to and from Hankham,the nearest service is at Stone Cross. There is no church in Hckkkham,there is one public phone box opposite the garage.There are several modern bungalows and some of the old cottages have been converted into larger, more expensive holmes. The oldest houses in the village include ,Peelings manor,The Dog house,Montague and Willoughby Cottage.
